name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Sunrise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: friendly staff, clean room, convenient location(close to Bank Atlantic Center) no problems!
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 4 days , rooms were clean front desk staff were very helpful , breakfast was great every Morning! Great location very close to Florida Panthers Arena , Sawgrass Mills Outlet Mall , IKea right beside and Harley Davidson dealer just behind the Inn. It was in a perfect location with all the right stuff close by . Rates for rooms very AFFORDABLE!!! Great little diner down the road Lester's. Overall a Excellent Place to stay!
reviews.title: Great stay for Shopping & Hockey!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Let me start by stating that we stayed at a nearby La Quinta "sister" property last year and thought we knew what we were getting into. We were simply expecting a place to sleep during our shopping excursion at Sawgrass Mills. However, the rooms were so dirty that we were extremely disappointed. Yes, I said "rooms"--- although there was just me and my wife---because for the first time ever, I actually asked to change rooms at a hotel. The first room we were assigned was extremely DIRTY. Many surfaces in the room were not clean, but the icing on the cake were the three sizeable dried urine stains on the toilet seat. There was also a beer cap on the floor in front of the garbage can in plain sight, and it was obvious the room had not been vacuumed in some time given the various debris on the floor.
reviews.title: Poor housekeeping prevented us from writing a good review!

reviews.text: (For those that might say the odd oversight might occur and perhaps a clerical error was made on some paperwork regarding the room being cleaned---It was obvious housekeeping had been in the room because a fresh sticker had been placed on the toliet paper roll to indicate their presence. )
reviews.title: Great stay at La Quinta

reviews.text: When we went to the 2nd room there were pubic hairs in the bath tub and one very noticeably on the toilet; but we decided that overall the second room was much better and we were afraid to ask for a third room given that we were only staying one night and in a hurry to get to the mall.
reviews.title: Best Kept Secret!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at La Quinta Inn and Suites for one night while in town for the Bon Jovi concert. It was conveniently located near the Bank Atlantic Center and restaurants. We booked a standard suite and it gave us a lot of room (separate living area and bed room with two double beds.) The hotel was very clean and was recently remodeled. The front desk staff was helpful and pleasant. We were pleased with the hotel and had a nice stay!
reviews.title: Very Nice Stay at La Quinta Inn and Suites

likes.liked: — Nice spacey and updated clean room and location near concert venue
likes.disliked: — wish they offered a standard suite with a king bed rather than two doubles

reviews.text: I stayed at the La Quinta in Sawgrass for a couple of days and had a very good experience. The staff was great and helpful. I want to thank Elena who is one of the Supervisors there for her help. I personally think that the staff is what makes the difference in any Hotel stay and you can't go wrong here.
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel for a trip down to the Orange Bowl in early January, 2008(Go Jayhawks!!!). It was exactly what I needed to make myself and my parents happy. The location can be a little tricky at first, but once you make it to the property it is much easier the next time.
reviews.title: Very Clean and Updated Hotel

likes.disliked: — No wired internet access in rooms, only wireless(My own fault I'm so behind!!!)

reviews.text: Both rooms were very clean and had a very modern feel. Rooms seemed to be recently renovated.
reviews.title: Nice stay and Great Staff
Worst Experience.
reviews.text: Although check-in did take a bit longer than average, the staff was quite courteous and friendly every chance they had.
Stayed for 1 night before a flight from Miami. Hotel and rooms are clean the hallway did smell of smoke though but it did'nt bother us. Free breakfast was nice staff friendly and helpful
reviews.title: Fine

reviews.text: I booked a non-smoking room and they give me one but in the smoking floor!!!!, well half smoking floor, really these guys think that the smoke will stay in the half floor, I ask for another room because I have asma nd I was with 2 chikldren, guess what???, "sorry we have no more room, please try tomorrow", incredible, I prefer to think that in fact they are full and no that we are from south america, so pls stay away from this "half non-smoking hotel"
reviews.title: if you hate smoke stay away!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in room 327 for 2 nights in mid-June. Room was nice, cool, and comfy - especially the beds...I even took off the sheet when we left to see what brand the mattress was (Simmons in case you are interested). It was obviously remodeled to have a more modern look. I stayed here a few years ago and wow...very nice.
reviews.title: Perfect Location - COMFY!

reviews.text: Pros: Close to Sawgrass Mall, Comfy Beds, Free Breakfast, Quiet Area. Fridge worked great!
reviews.title: Excelent, would go again!

reviews.text: Cons: Could have been a bit cleaner (ex: hair in shower, smudge of "dirt" near potty). It really was not MAJOR issue, but was something I noticed...and if I notice it...well...it is apparent.
reviews.title: Hidden Treasure
Nice Stay
reviews.text: As other readers have written, there are two hotels directly across from each other. I stayed at the one that is beside the new IKEA. This one is updated, clean and looks exactly like the pictures shown by the Hotel. The beds are very comfortable! Staff is helpful. Had no problems at this hotel.

reviews.title: Worst place I have ever stayed!!!
reviews.text: First, understand that there are two LQ's right nest to each other, and you may get booked for the lower quality one. Be sure you check. Here is the letter that I sent to LQ after staying at the lower class LQ.

reviews.title: Nice Hotel for the price.
reviews.text: I would like to take this chance to explain why I have just experienced the worst stay at a La Quinta ever.

reviews.title: Nothing Suite about this LQ :(
reviews.text: First, I am unsure why La Quinta decided to have two different hotels right next to each other, but it is a little troubling that I make reservations based on the online view of one hotel and end up in the second, lower quality, version of a La Quinta for three nights.

reviews.title: Great on the outside but smells inside
reviews.text: Then, when I walk into the bathroom and see the tub with stray hairs in it, I become quite disgusted with my room. No need to ask for another room as the associate I am staying here with has a different room with the same results. There was no maid service the first day either. Not sure why, but I came back to the same room I left in the morning. Minus the hair in the shower that I cleaned out myself in order to use it, of course.

aka: La Quinta Inn And Suites Sunrise At Sawgrass Mills
